text: Demi Monde Bizarros subtitled "Songs about sex, satan and sado-masochism" is the fourth and last album by the Swedish metal band Notre Dame, released with two different covers. The album has 14 songs and it closes with two live tracks, one of them being a cover song, that fit the studio tracks quite well and re-enforce the theatrical atmosphere even more. ==Track listing== ==Credits== * Snowy Shaw - vocals, guitar and keyboard * Mannekin De Sade - drums * Vampirella - vocals ==References== ==External links== * http://www.discogs.com/Notre-Dame-Demi-Monde-Bizarros/release/497549 Category:2004 albums
title: Demi Monde Bizarros
